name: inventory-management-system
description: Professional Inventory Management System with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.start:production: NODE_ENV=production concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run serve"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint

author: Inventory Management Team
